name: Banana, Inc.
description:
For centuries the humans have harvested our precious bananas without giving us any of the cash they profit! For a long time humans have locked up our kind in cages at zoos, destroyed our jungle habitats and decided when we get to eat bananas… Well, that all ends today!

We are going to take over the banana supply chain in order to make our own money and spend it how we wish. We must grow more and more bananas to eventually dominate the banana market on a global scale. We will start to develop new banana flavors and styles in order to expand even further and turn the world into a banana bonanza super frenzy. We can even outsell and beat those little chickens and their fancy eggs that have long dominated in humans supermarkets. Come join us and help us make this dream come true!

Features
- Farm and sell TONS of Bananas for cash
- Hire monkeys, build factories, upgrade shipping
- Click to spawn bananas
- Tap to increase your monkeys gather speed
- Unlock all Banana types!
- Unlock all Banana farms!
- Monkeys work and make income while you are idle

Can you unlock the final Diamond Banana kingdom?
